meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Briefing Item
agenda_items.description: Briefing on DCA190-002 Off-Street Parking & Loading Code Amendment: Consideration of amending Chapter 51 and 51A of the Dallas Development Code regarding minimum off-street parking and loading requirements, including establishing a Transportation Demand Management Plan and off-street parking design standards.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapters 51 and 51A of the Dallas City Code regarding off-street parking and loading requirements, including various sections related to zoning and parking regulations.
